name: VideoStudio Project
summary: Learn about .VSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VideoStudio is a video editor for home and small business users that allows them to create polished movies from imported or recorded video clips. The software is available in Ultimate and Pro editions, with Ultimate providing more features than Pro.
When creating a slideshow or movie, you can save your edits as a VSP project file, which you can close and re-open to edit. To create a VideoStudio VSP project file, follow these steps:
Select File → Save or Save As....
NOTE: Corel acquired VideoStudio from Ulead in 2006.

description: A VSP file is a project created by Corel VideoStudio, a video-editing app for creating slideshows and movies. It contains video project data, including references to video, audio, and image files, and movie timeline settings and effects. VideoStudio users save projects as VSP files and then export them to video formats, such as .MP4, .MOV, and .AVI to share.

instructions: You can open a VSP file with Corel VideoStudio (Windows). To open a VSP project file, select File → Open Project..., navigate to the location of the VSP file, choose the file, and click Open.
Corel VideoStudio can convert VSP files to various file types, including the following formats:
You can also publish VSP files to online video-sharing services and burn them to DVD or Blu-ray discs.
